title: Wheatfield
credit_line: Robert S. Waters Charitable Trust Fund and Frances G. Scaife Fund
provenance_text:
Private collection, South America [1]; sale, Sotheby's New York, NY, October 25, 2005, no. 32 [2]; C.G. Boerner, LLC, New York, NY; purchased by Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, April 2006.

Notes:
[1]. Correspondence with Sotheby's in curatorial file did not provide further information on this private collection other than to offer speculation that the work "must have been in the South American collection since the late nineteenth century..."
[2]. Sale titled "19th Century European Art."
